    <sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE">
        <access>package_private</access>
        <active>true</active>
        <api_name>global.BubbleWorkbenchService</api_name>
        <caller_access/>
        <client_callable>true</client_callable>
        <description/>
        <name>BubbleWorkbenchService</name>
        <script><![CDATA[var BubbleWorkbenchService = Class.create();
BubbleWorkbenchService.prototype = {
    initialize: function() {
    },
	
	_fetchConfigInfo : function(sysId) {
		var gr = new GlideRecord('bubble_chart_workbench');
		var config;
		if(sysId)
			gr.addQuery('sys_id', sysId);
		else
			gr.addQuery('isdefault', 'true');
		gr.query();
		if(gr.next()){
			config={};
			config.name = gr.getDisplayValue('name');			
			config.topLeftLabel = gr.getDisplayValue('top_left_label');
			config.topRightLabel = gr.getDisplayValue('top_right_label');			
			config.bottomLeftLabel = gr.getDisplayValue('bottom_left_label');
			config.bottomRightLabel = gr.getDisplayValue('bottom_right_label');			

			config.topLeftColor = gr.getValue('top_left_color');
			config.topRightColor = gr.getValue('top_right_color');			
			config.bottomLeftColor = gr.getValue('bottom_left_color');
			config.bottomRightColor = gr.getValue('bottom_right_color');			
			config.quadrantLabelColor = gr.getValue('quadrant_label_color');
			
			config.tableName = gr.getValue('table');							
			config.xField = gr.getValue('metric_x_field');
			config.yField = gr.getValue('metric_y_field');
			config.zField = gr.getValue('metric_z_field');
			
			config.xLabel = gr.getDisplayValue('x_axis_label');
			config.yLabel = gr.getDisplayValue('y_axis_label');
			config.zLabel = gr.getDisplayValue('z_axis_label');
			
			config.listView = gr.getValue('list_view');
		}else{
			gs.log("Workbench Not found!");
		}
		return config;
	},
	
	getWorkbenchData : function(workbenchId,sys_ids) {
		var config = this._fetchConfigInfo(workbenchId);	
		var records = [];
		if(!config) return;
		var json1 = new JSON();
		var sys_id_array = json1.decode(sys_ids);
		
		if(sys_id_array && sys_id_array.length > 0) {
			var gr = new GlideRecordSecure(config.tableName);
				
			gr.addQuery("sys_id","IN",sys_id_array.join(","));
			gr.query();
			while (gr.next()) {
				var record = {};
				record.sys_id = gr.getUniqueValue();
				record.short_description = gr.getValue('short_description');
				record.x = gr.getValue(config.xField);
				record.y = gr.getValue(config.yField);
				record.z = gr.getValue(config.zField);
				records.push(record);
			}
		}
		
		var response = {'config': config, 'points': records};
		var json = new JSON();
		var jsonResponse = json.encode(response);

		return jsonResponse;		
	},
	
	updatePoint: function(workbenchId, sysId, pointX, pointY, pointZ) {
		var config = this._fetchConfigInfo(workbenchId);
		if(!config){
			return false;
		}
		var grUpdateStatus = null;
		var gr = new GlideRecordSecure(config.tableName);
		gr.addQuery('sys_id', sysId);
		gr.query();
		if(gr.next()) {
			gr.setValue(config.xField, pointX);
			gr.setValue(config.yField, pointY);			
			gr.setValue(config.zField, pointZ);
			grUpdateStatus = gr.update();
		}
		if(grUpdateStatus == null){
			gs.log("Update failed for table:"+config.tableName+" sysId:"+ sysId+" with values "+config.xField+":"+pointX+", "+config.yField+":"+pointY+", "+config.zField+":"+pointZ);
			return false;
		}else if(grUpdateStatus == sysId){
			gs.log("Updated table:"+config.tableName+" sysId:"+ sysId+" with values "+config.xField+":"+pointX+", "+config.yField+":"+pointY+", "+config.zField+":"+pointZ);
			return true;
		}
	},

    type: 'BubbleWorkbenchService'
};]]></script>
